tagline: See what's out there. Before it sees you.
style: action movie trailer style, intense and dramatic
lyrics:
What's lurking in the darkness?
Night Vision Warehouse knows!
Military grade equipment,
For wherever the truth goes!
See what's out there - before it sees you!
Night Vision Warehouse - gear up tonight!
suno_prompt: action movie trailer style jingle, dramatic male vocals, pounding drums and synth brass, military surplus store commercial, intense and exciting, 18 seconds
notes: Tactical gear store for amateur paranormal investigators
